thread.section_title: Albergo del Senato - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 2 Great Nights
thread.title_full: 2 Great Nights - Review of Albergo del Senato, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: TL02474
title: 2 Great Nights
text:
Stayed March 06 through 08 2017
Room 204, the only room with a balcony
The staff was EXCELLENT. Very helpful with getting our lost luggage back from Airline
Really fun to talk to everyday. Always happy. Always personable.
Location is perfect.
Room:
Room wasn't huge
Bed was firmly comfortable
Great looking decor
Bathroom /shower very nice
Hotel:
Very clean / new looking, with great old charm.
Breakfast:
Yummy. What can be said bad about a breakfast that offers Italian pastries?
Room Tip: Facing Pantheon for great view. See more room tips
